nodes.speaker: Insider
nodes.text: You made it past the gate. That means you're either lucky… or dangerous.

choices.text: I need access to the palace perimeter.

nodes.speaker: Insider
nodes.text: Access is bought with proof. If you want a route, bring me a record that ties the King’s clerk to the executions.

nodes.speaker: Insider
nodes.text: Records room, east block. Middle ledger. Go quiet. If Heat is high, they’ll notice your shadow.

nodes.speaker: Insider
nodes.text: …This is enough. Now—do you trust me to move it, or do you keep it and walk alone?

choices.text: I trust you. Use it to open the route.
I don’t trust anyone. I’ll keep it.
